ASSISTING YOU AT EVERY STEP

About Fernbex

We are a team of professional and reliable experts dealing in all kinds of immigration services worldwide. We work closely with our clients to provide them with the most suitable plan for their next move.

At Fernbex, you get everything under one roof: we deal with a variety of visa processes. You name it – we do it. It doesn’t matter if you are a student, tourist, or a business; we have the right solutions for all of your travel concerns.

Above all, we are a client-oriented organization and believe in 100% customer satisfaction. Team Fernbex has highly efficient and skilled professionals who will work closely with you, offering you support and guidance on every step with a strategical approach.

We offer:

[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1664192703187{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Visa and immigration consultancy

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Complete assessment and step-by-step legal advice

Hassle-free process

OUR VISION

We take you to places you have dreamed of!

Fernbex has successfully helped thousands of students and other people looking for better education or business opportunities. Fernbex provides assistance to every individual who dreams of moving to another destination.

Our motto is to provide our customers with the best possible service, so they can grow prosperously in their lives. We believe in changing lives – and so we are determined to put our best foot forward.

We understand your expectations – and we promise to deliver nothing but the best in terms of services and consultation.

APPROVED APPLICATIONS 500+
COUNTRIES 98+
QUALIFIED CONSULTANTS 168+

TSTIMONIALS

Customers are family

We firmly believe that! We aim to prosper as a company while providing the best services. Want to know more about us? You can hear what our clients have to say about us.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column cmt_textcolor=”white” cmt_col_bg_expand=”right” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1661930767980{margin-top: 199px !important;margin-left: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 28px !important;background-image: url(https://fernbex.demonstration-projects.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/map.jpg?id=3420) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” cmt_responsive_css=”67728009|colbreak_no||||0px|||||colbreak_no|||||||||colbreak_no|||||||||550px|colbreak_no|20px||||||||”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1593059556473{margin-top: -192px !important;margin-right: -330px !important;}” cmt_responsive_css=”60782578|colbreak_no||0px|||||||colbreak_no|||||||||colbreak_no|||||||||550px|colbreak_no|40px||||||||”][vc_column_inner]
I have never experienced such great professionals. I have been searching for immigration consultants for so long but never could find any. These guys are superb and very professional. Team Fernbex is amazing; I really love them!

Raina Sultana

UAE
I always wanted to work in an international company but could never find the right one. I did all that I could, but no luck. Then I heard about Fernbex from a friend who had successfully immigrated to the US. I decided to try my luck. I got my dream job in one of the most reputable companies. It was probably the best thing that happened to me. I am so glad I chose the right people for that job.

Jeffrey Brown

Latvia
I have a hard time trusting companies, but Fernbex has proven me wrong. I chose Fernbex as my immigration consultants, and they turned out to be the best people for this job. They did everything. They looked for the right universities and gave me multiple options to choose from, then they arranged my visa and helped me through the process. Finally, I could study at my favorite university.

Amina Abdul Rahman

UAE
